chat.botwmcs.realmshost.inClientMode: You are in client mode to use LTSX mod. Some features are disabled.
gui.botwmcs.realmshost.farmer.tooltip: Farmers are the backbone of the economy. They are able to grow crops and breed animals.
gui.botwmcs.realmshost.miner.tooltip: Miners are able to mine ores and smelt them into ingots.
gui.botwmcs.realmshost.knight.tooltip: Knights are able to fight mobs and protect the realm.
gui.botwmcs.realmshost.defaultTown.toolt: The default town is the town that all new players will join.
